pr_title: Move compliance ignore users from audit config to compliance config

timeline.message: Move compliance ignore users from audit config to compliance config

timeline.bodyText: Is it possible to move this to a common util class, since this seems to be used by both AuditConfig and ComplianceConfig?
timeline.author: debjanibnrj

replies.bodyText: Should ComplianceConfig be moved to AuditConfig? Looks like Filter and Compliance are both related to Audit.
replies.author: vrozov

replies.bodyText:
There will be a Compliance to represent storage in index and generate ComplianceConfig out of it. Dependency on settings is stopping from directly using it unless there is some workaround.
This is where I want to get to https://github.com/opendistro-for-elasticsearch/security/blob/5a81a60cc05d37d92a965e8cb03a5214c10e03c1/src/main/java/com/amazon/opendistroforelasticsearch/security/auditlog/config/AuditConfig.java
Hence thought of doing it separate PRs.
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: Consider cutting a separate (preliminary) PR to move ComplienceConfig to AuditConfig if that will help to address @debjanibnrj comment.
replies.author: vrozov

replies.bodyText:
Referencing @debjanibnrj comment I don't think there needs to be a separate util class as it can be just a util function within AuditConfig and the function itself might disappear with  #325
And please consider #409 for preliminary changes
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: @debjanibnrj Wondering if your concerns are addressed?
replies.author: sujithvm

replies.bodyText: @sujithvm Sounds good since this function is likely to be removed in the future.
replies.author: debjanibnrj

timeline.bodyText: Please update Filter constructor and remove unused parameters.
timeline.author: vrozov
